page.title: 08CHILDREN'S LIKES IN 1985
page.content: Food-Fish and Chips{113 Drink-Cola{347 }Colour-Blue{131 Television programmes- ITV-Coronation Street{131 BBC1-Top of the Pops{90 BBC2-Young Ones{336 CH.4-Brookside{227 Cartoons-Tom and Jerry{81 Magazine-Smash Hits{88 Film-Wild Geese{16 Football Team-Liverpool{222 School Lesson-Physical Education{118 Girl's Name-Nicola{26 Boy's Name-Steven{17 Pop Group-Wham{78 Pop Star-Paul Young{39 Record Disc-'Frankie'{39 Sport-Football{88 Footwear-'trainer'(Training Shoe){163 This survey was conducted at Deighton High School from{417}pupils aged 11-16 both boys and girls.July 1985.
